name: Metapod

attacks.name: Stiffen
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all damage done to Metapod during your opponent's next turn. (Any other effects of attacks still happen.)

attacks.name: Stun Spore
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pok√©mon is now Paralyzed.

flavorText: It is vulnerable to attack because its shell is soft, exposing its weak and tender body. LV. 21 #11

strengths: High 70 HP for a Stage 1 Pokemon provides excellent survivability
Stiffen can potentially negate all damage for a turn
Stun Spore can paralyze opponents, preventing their attacks
Solid wall Pokemon that can stall for time
weaknesses: High retreat cost of 2 makes it difficult to switch out
Both attacks rely on coin flips, making them unreliable
Stun Spore only deals 20 damage, which is low for 2 energy on a Stage 1
Cannot evolve further in Base Set (Butterfree not included)
Stiffen deals no damage, wasting offensive opportunities
synergies: Defender combined with Stiffen can create multiple turns of damage prevention
Switch or Scoop Up can help Metapod escape the Active position due to high retreat cost
PlusPower boosts Stun Spore to 30 damage
Potion or Super Potion can heal Metapod while it stalls
counters: High damage attackers that can knockout in one hit
